original_text: Thus were the visions of mine head in my bed; I saw, and behold a tree in the midst of the earth, and the height thereof was great.
korean_text: 내가 침상에서 나의 머리 속으로 받은 환상이 이러하니라 내가 본즉 땅의 중앙에 한 나무가 있는 것을 보았는데 높이가 높더니

sentences.original_text: Thus were the visions of mine head
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 내 머리의 환상이 있었으며

sentences.original_text: in the midst of the earth
and the height thereof was great
